items.title: KFC Centraal Station
items.description: Located near Rotterdam Centraal Station, this KFC branch offers a variety of delicious fried chicken options.

items.title: KFC Beurs
items.description: Situated in the heart of Rotterdam's city center, KFC Beurs is a popular spot for locals and tourists alike.

items.title: KFC Alexandrium
items.description: Found in the bustling shopping district of Alexandrium, this KFC location provides a convenient dining option for shoppers.

items.title: KFC Zuidplein
items.description: Located in the Zuidplein shopping mall, KFC Zuidplein is a great place to enjoy some finger-licking chicken after a day of shopping.

items.title: KFC Binnenwegplein
items.description: Situated on Binnenwegplein, this KFC branch offers a convenient location for a quick and tasty meal.

items.title: KFC Oude Binnenweg
items.description: Located on the historic Oude Binnenweg street, this KFC restaurant combines the taste of KFC with the charm of Rotterdam's city center.

items.title: KFC Meent
items.description: Situated on the vibrant Meent street, this KFC branch is surrounded by shops, cafes, and other popular attractions.

items.title: KFC Hoogstraat
items.description: Located on Hoogstraat, this KFC restaurant is a great place to grab a bite while exploring Rotterdam's lively streets.

items.title: KFC Wijnhaven
items.description: Situated near the Wijnhaven, this KFC location offers picturesque views along with their mouth-watering chicken menu.

items.title: KFC Blaak
items.description: Found in the iconic Blaak area, this KFC branch is a convenient stop for visitors exploring nearby attractions like the Markthal.
